Title: #86 What helps kids really learn? #MondayMotivation
Description:
Andrew Stadel @mr_stadel discusses his summer research topic, "what helps kids learn?" As we grapple with this topic, Andrew shares resources and how he's pursuing this topic.

Read the show notes at www.coolcatteacher.com/e86 about 5 hours after this show goes live on iTunes.

Listen to the rest of the shows at www.coolcatteacher.com/podcast
